Package Classes

Class UserProfileManager

java.lang.Object
Classes.UserProfileManager
public class UserProfileManager extends Object
UserProfileManager The UserProfileManager class provides methods for managing user profiles, including adding, updating, deleting, and fetching user profiles in Firebase Firestore. It also provides methods for uploading, updating, and deleting user profile pictures in Firebase Storage.
See Also:
  • UserProfile

      public UserProfileManager()
      Empty constructor for UserProfileManager

  • Method Details

    • checkUserExists

      public void checkUserExists(String deviceID, UserProfileManager.OnUserCheckListener listener)
      Checks if a user exists in Firestore by their device ID.
      Parameters:
      deviceID - the device ID used to check for an existing user profile.
      listener - the listener to handle the result of the check.

    • addUserProfile

      public void addUserProfile(UserProfile userProfile, String deviceID)
      Adds a new user profile to Firestore.
      Parameters:
      userProfile - the UserProfile object to add to Firestore.
      deviceID - the unique device ID for the user.

    • updateUserProfile

      public void updateUserProfile(UserProfile userProfile, String deviceID)
      Updates an existing user profile in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      userProfile - the UserProfile object containing updated data.
      deviceID - the unique device ID for the user.

    • deleteUserProfile

      public void deleteUserProfile(String deviceID)
      Deletes a user profile from Firestore using the device ID.
      Parameters:
      deviceID - the unique device ID for the user to delete.

    • getUserProfile

      public void getUserProfile(String deviceID, UserProfileManager.OnUserProfileFetchListener callback)
      Fetches a user profile from Firestore based on the device ID.
      Parameters:
      deviceID - the unique device ID of the user profile to fetch.
      callback - the callback listener for handling the fetched user profile or any errors.

    • uploadProfilePicture

      public void uploadProfilePicture(android.net.Uri picUri, String deviceID, UserProfileManager.OnUploadPictureListener listener)
      Uploads a profile picture to Firebase Storage and updates the Firestore user profile with the image URL.
      Parameters:
      picUri - the URI of the profile picture to upload.
      deviceID - the unique device ID for the user.
      listener - the listener for handling the result of the upload operation.

    • updateProfilePictureInFireStore

      public void updateProfilePictureInFireStore(String deviceID, String picURL, UserProfileManager.OnUpdateListener listener)
      Updates the profile picture URL in the Firestore user profile.
      Parameters:
      deviceID - the unique device ID for the user.
      picURL - the URL of the new profile picture.
      listener - the listener to handle the result of the update operation.

    • deleteProfilePicture

      public void deleteProfilePicture(String deviceID, UserProfileManager.OnDeleteListener listener)
      Deletes a user's profile picture from Firebase Storage and Firestore.
      Parameters:
      deviceID - the unique device ID for the user.
      listener - the listener to handle the result of the deletion operation.
